name: The Secret of Chunky Salsa
description:
In this game, you play as Colin, a son of a humble chronicler from a farming village of the Bearders, called so because of their tradition to wear beards of unusual sizes.

A grave danger hanging over the village sets Colin forth on the adventure to save his family and friends...

(for more information about the game background and gameplay info see the ReadMe)

GAME FEATURES:
Resolution: 640x480
- Blood feuds.
- The power of love.
- Eldritch abominations.
- Farmers.
- Beards of unusual size.
- Chunky salsa.
- An ancient war.
+ 2 endings.

(The game is available in English, Russian, and Spanish)
